name: X War Fighting:Dump Break Wall
description:
X War Fighting: Dump Break Wall is a Shooting Games with Gun and an army games. In modern strike game get ready to face the terrorist encounter inside the jungle with no one other here around to help in first person shooting games.

Features:
- Easy selection of weapon
- Beautiful 3D environment of game
- Totally Free rampage shooter game
- Advance weapon selection
- Excellent Hill Environment for military attack
- Outclass Sound Effects, Background and shooting sounds.
- First Person Shooting
